importantIssues.message: 11 flow gaps - slides don't connect logically

recommendations: Add emotional dynamics - establish tension before offering resolution
Fix 11 slide transition(s) that lack logical connection
Add more stakes indicators (numbers, impact, consequences)

textContext.headline: What if presentations took minutes, not hours?
bodyText: The average professional spends 8 hours creating a single deck. Most of that time is wasted on formatting, not thinking.

textContext.headline: Nano Banana Slidecraft
bodyText: AI-generated visuals in single-file HTML slides. From blank page to polished deck in minutes.

textContext.headline: Four Steps to Done
bodyText: From blank page to polished deck in minutes. No design skills required.

images.alt: Three brand identity cards: Tech, Consulting, Biotech

textContext.headline: One Template, Many Brands
bodyText: Switch visual identities instantly with a URL parameter. Perfect for agencies and teams.

textContext.headline: Set Up Your Deck
bodyText: Three things to configure: your materials, your workflow, and your templates.

images.alt: Illustration of organized folders with documents, logos, and data flowing into a presentation

textContext.headline: Add Your Materials
bodyText: Drop briefs, notes, and assets into the resources folder. The AI uses these for context.

images.alt: Terminal window showing Claude CLI conversation refining a slide deck

textContext.headline: Iterate with Claude
bodyText: Chat with the CLI to refine slides. It reads your deck, evaluates layouts, and makes targeted fixes.

images.alt: Six slide layout templates arranged in a grid: Title, Split, Metrics, Quote, Diagram, Gallery

textContext.headline: Six Core Templates
bodyText: Every story fits one of these patterns. Mix and match for rhythm.

textContext.headline: AI-Powered Visuals
bodyText: Four generation modes for every visual need. Let's explore each one.

images.alt: AI-generated banana character at a laptop

textContext.headline: Text to Image
bodyText: Generate diagrams, texture, and hero art with a prompt that locks brand tone and lighting.

textContext.headline: Image to Image
bodyText: Use a base image and restyle it into your brand's visual language. Set a base image in the generator panel.

textContext.headline: Text to Video
bodyText: Short cinematic clips that open a section or reinforce a transition. Expect longer generation times.
Note: Video playback requires local hosting or a video-capable CDN. Static preview shown here.

textContext.headline: Image to Video
bodyText: Animate a still into a short motion vignette. Provide a base image in the generator panel.
Note: Video playback requires local hosting or a video-capable CDN. Static preview shown here.

images.alt: Brand identity system showing color palette, typography, and visual style

textContext.headline: Make It Yours
bodyText: Update CSS variables to match your brand. Keep contrast high, typography confident.

textContext.headline: Your Next Deck Starts Here
bodyText: Stop wrestling with formatting. Start telling your story.

slides.title: Hook
slides.content: The Problem What if presentations took minutes, not hours? The average professional spends 8 hours creating a single deck. Most of that time is wasted on formatting, not thinking.

complexSentences.text: Most of that time is wasted on formatting, not thinking

slides.title: Solution
slides.content: The Answer Nano Banana Slidecraft AI-generated visuals in single-file HTML slides. From blank page to polished deck in minutes. One file per deck AI-generated images Multi-brand ready

slides.title: How It Works
slides.content: The Process Four Steps to Done From blank page to polished deck in minutes. No design skills required. 1. Create 2. Design 3. Generate 4. Present

slides.title: Brand System
slides.content: Built for Scale One Template, Many Brands Switch visual identities instantly with a URL parameter. Perfect for agencies and teams. Usage ?entity=northwind ?entity=apex ?entity=coastal

slides.title: Getting Started
slides.content: Getting Started Set Up Your Deck Three things to configure: your materials, your workflow, and your templates.

complexSentences.text: Getting Started Set Up Your Deck Three things to configure: your materials, your workflow, and your ...

slides.title: Resources
slides.content: Add Your Materials Drop briefs, notes, and assets into the resources folder. The AI uses these for context. resources/  assets/ logos, images  materials/ briefs, notes  prompts/ saved prompts

slides.title: CLI Workflow
slides.content: Iterate with Claude Chat with the CLI to refine slides. It reads your deck, evaluates layouts, and makes targeted fixes. Review Refine Regenerate

slides.title: Templates
slides.content: Six Core Templates Every story fits one of these patterns. Mix and match for rhythm. Title Split Metrics Quote Diagram Gallery

slides.title: Deep Dive
slides.content: Going Deeper AI-Powered Visuals Four generation modes for every visual need. Let's explore each one.

slides.title: Capability Map
slides.content: Overview Gemini Media Map Text-to-image for diagrams. Image-to-image for brand stylization. Veo for motion. Text Prompt Image Base Text to Image Image to Image Text to Video Image to Video

slides.title: Text to Image
slides.content: Text to Image Generate diagrams, texture, and hero art with a prompt that locks brand tone and lighting. Prompt Editorial illustration, warm parchment palette, crisp linework, minimal shadows.

slides.title: Image to Image
slides.content: Image to Image Use a base image and restyle it into your brand's visual language. Set a base image in the generator panel. Prompt Restyle into a matte collage with warm paper textures and bold orange accents.

slides.title: Text to Video
slides.content: Text to Video Short cinematic clips that open a section or reinforce a transition. Expect longer generation times. Prompt Slow pan across layered paper textures and a glowing brand mark, soft studio lighting. Note: Video playback requires local hosting or a video-capable CDN. Static preview shown here.

slides.title: Image to Video
slides.content: Image to Video Animate a still into a short motion vignette. Provide a base image in the generator panel. Prompt Gentle parallax, soft shadow drift, camera push in, warm studio grade. Note: Video playback requires local hosting or a video-capable CDN. Static preview shown here.

slides.title: Brand Tokens
slides.content: Customization Make It Yours Update CSS variables to match your brand. Keep contrast high, typography confident. Ink #0d1117 Accent #ff6b35 Sage #93a77a Slate #3a4654

slides.title: Call to Action
slides.content: Start Now Your Next Deck Starts Here Stop wrestling with formatting. Start telling your story. Clone the repo Add your brief Generate

slides.title: Title
slides.content: Eyebrow Slide Title Subtitle with a concise thesis. Chip one Chip two

slides.title: Split
slides.content: Section title Narrative text goes here. Media

slides.title: Metrics
slides.content: 45% Metric label 3.2x Metric label 12 Metric label
